org.vaniglia.messagequeue.storage
Class MessageStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.vaniglia.messagequeue.storage.MessageStorage
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageStorageEnhancedFileSystem, MessageStorageFileSystem, MessageStorageJDBC, MessageStorageMemory
public abstract class MessageStorage
extends java.lang.Object

This is the base class for Message Storages.

Class constructor.

Parameters:
name - the message storage name
Method Detail

getStorage

public static MessageStorage getStorage(MessageStorageType storageType,
                                        MessageStorageParameters params)
This method is used to create a Message Storage given its name and storage type.

Parameters:
storageType - the storage type of the Message Storage
params - the parameters for the storage
Returns:
a newly created Message Storage with the given name and of the given storage type.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Retruns the name of the Message Storage.

Returns:
the name of the Message Storage.

getType

public abstract MessageStorageType getType()
Returns the type of the Message Storage.

Returns:
the type of the Message Storage.

push

public abstract void push(Message msg,
                          long timestamp)
                   throws MessageStorageException
Push a new message in the storage. Shall the message be already in the storage, an exception will be raised.

Parameters:
msg - the message to push in.
timestamp - the message due timestamp.
Throws:
MessageStorageException - if the Message is already in the storage.

pop

public abstract Message pop(long timestamp)
Pops out a message from the storage with a due date earlier than the provided timestamp. The returned message is not removed from the storage but is moved into a special storage area from where can be deleted using the removeMessage method.

Parameters:
timestamp - the timestamp
Returns:
the first message in the storage with msg.timestamp <= timestamp

pop

public Message pop()
Pops out a message from the storage with a due date earlier than now. The returned message is not removed from the storage but is moved into a special storage area from where can be deleted using the removeMessage method.

Returns:
the first message in the storage with msg.timestamp <= now

removeMessage

public abstract void removeMessage(Message msg)
                            throws MessageStorageException
Removes a message from the storage special stocking area of messages previously returned using one of the pop methods.

Parameters:
msg - the message to remove.
Throws:
MessageStorageException - if the message is not in the storage special stocking area.

size

public abstract long size()
Returns the number of messages in the storage.

Returns:
the number fo messages in the storage.

clear

public abstract void clear()
Removes all the messages from the storage, including messages in the special stocking area.

getMessageList

public abstract java.lang.String[] getMessageList()
Returns a list of all message's ids in the storage.

Returns:
a list of all message's ids in the storage.

getAllMessages

public abstract Message[] getAllMessages()
Retruns all the messages in the storage including messages in the special area. Returned messages are not moved in the storage special stocking area and so cannot be removed from the storage before popping them out first.

Returns:
all the messages in the storage.

printAllMessages

public abstract void printAllMessages(java.io.PrintStream stream)
